meanings.definition: A person who enthusiastically follows a current trend or fashion.
meanings.sent1: The faddist quickly embraced the new dance craze.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a faddist for always wearing the latest styles.
meanings.sent3: The faddist decided to try out the new hobby of knitting.
meanings.sent4: Like a chameleon, the faddist changed interests with each passing season.
meanings.sent5: The faddist's wardrobe was a colorful reflection of ever-changing trends.

meanings.definition: One who adopts a temporary interest or activity.
meanings.sent1: Being a faddist, he jumped from one hobby to another every month.
meanings.sent2: The group of faddists gathered to discuss their latest obsessions.
meanings.sent3: The faddist decided to take up painting, only to switch to gardening the next week.
meanings.sent4: Her faddist nature led her to try out various diets in a short span of time.
meanings.sent5: The faddist's bookshelf was filled with half-finished novels on different subjects.
